title: Leica Announces the Leica SL3-S
description: Leica has just announced the Leica SL3-S replacing Leica’s SL2-S. This is Leica’s fast 24MP full-frame L-mount camera. It will sit alongside the company’s SL3 high-resolution camera. Key features include; The camera retails at $5295, and you can preorder from one of our favorite vendors below. Specifications Price MSRP 5295 Body type Body type SLR-style [...] The post Leica Announces the Leica SL3-S appeared first on Canon Rumors.
author: Richard
